full_description: pick up one bottle with one arm, and pick up another bottle with the other arm, then put them to proper position
schema: {A} notifies one bottle to be catched,{B} notifies the other bottle to be catched. arm comes as a literal here
preference: num of words should not exceed 10.Degree of detail avg 5

template_example.reasoning_and_reflection: It's the beginning of the task. I will grasp left bottle first with left arm and grasp right bottle with right arm. After grasp them, I will raise them and move according to assistant info.

Because the x,y position of left bottle now is [-0.2,0.1] and right bottle is [0.2,0.1]. To move to the target position(left is [-0.06, -0.105] and right is [0.06,-0.105]), I will move left bottle right about 0.14m and behind about 0.205m and move right bottle left about 0.15m and behind about 0.205m.
